snippet: Portugal Coach Paulo Bento has left the team because of poor results, including a 1-0 home loss to Albania on Sunday.
abstract: Paulo Bento departs as coach of Portugal's national soccer team by mutual agreement after string of poor results.
lead_paragraph: Portugal Coach Paulo Bento has left the team because of poor results, including a 1-0 home loss to Albania on Sunday.

headline.main: Mutual Split for Portugal and Coach
headline.print_headline: Mutual Split for Portugal and Coach
